mapper.select: SELECT id, account_id, transaction_type, amount, currency, description, executed_at, created_at FROM transactions WHERE id = #{id}::uuid
SELECT id, account_id, transaction_type, amount, currency, description, executed_at, created_at FROM transactions WHERE account_id = #{accountId}::uuid ORDER BY executed_at DESC
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM transactions WHERE id = #{id}::uuid)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (id, account_id, transaction_type, amount, currency, description, executed_at, created_at) VALUES (#{transaction.id}::uuid, #{transaction.accountId}::uuid, #{transaction.transactionType}, #{transaction.amount}, #{transaction.currency}, #{transaction.description}, #{transaction.executedAt}, #{transaction.createdAt})
